title: Create a Dashboard Mockup
description: An agent must create a text-based mockup of a web dashboard for a client.

tasks.description: Based on a list of required KPIs, define the widgets needed for the dashboard (e.g., 'Revenue Trend Line Chart', 'Top 5 Products Bar Chart').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent lists all the required visual components.

tasks.description: Arrange the widgets into a 2x2 grid layout, describing the position of each widget.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent describes a balanced and logical layout.

tasks.description: For each widget, describe its appearance and the data it would show.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a detailed text description of the full dashboard mockup.
